name: Spell of Peaceful Calm
description:
Spell of Peaceful Calm

Yell at the moon -- shake your fist at the moon -- yell at the moon -- hurl rocks. Repeat.

Q: How do I play?

A: Use the mouse

Q: Do I need a mic?

A: Yes

Q: The fist, I'm stuck

A: You have to hold the mouse-button down for a while to have that fist shaking feeling.

Inspiration: Why did you do this?
